subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Yoenis Cespedes hit a three-run single, and the Oakland Athletics beat the host Toronto Blue Jays, 7-2, on Tuesday night for their season-best sixth straight victory.
snippet: Yoenis Cespedes hit a three-run single, and the Oakland Athletics beat the host Toronto Blue Jays, 7-2, on Tuesday night for their season-best sixth straight victory.
